data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Ishikawa, Japan.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ishikawa, Japan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ishikawa, Japan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,618 believers in Ishikawa, Japan a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Ishikawa, Japan the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Okinawan, Ryukyuan people might believe through him.
Father, help the 6,618 believers in Ishikawa to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,162,282 lost friends and neighbors.
Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Ishikawa, Japan, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Ishikawa.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Ishikawa
